thread.title: Stonebridge Companies’ Fairfield Inn & Suites by Marriott Loveland Welcomes Northern Colorado to See Heart’s Love Equals Music Tour this December
thread.title_full: Stonebridge Companies’ Fairfield Inn & Suites by Marriott Loveland Welcomes Northern Colorado to See Heart’s Love Equals Music Tour this December

author: Maggie Mistovich
title: Stonebridge Companies’ Fairfield Inn & Suites by Marriott Loveland Welcomes Northern Colorado to See Heart’s Love Equals Music Tour this December
text:
Rock & Roll Hall of Fame Band, Heart, is coming to the Budweiser Events Center in Loveland, on Thursday, December 10th at 7:30 pm. Storming the charts in the ‘70’s, ‘80’s and ‘90’s, with famous songs “If Looks Could Kill”, “Crazy on You”, “What About Love” and many more, Heart’s Love Equals Music Tour is sure to be a hit. Ticket prices for the event range from $36 to $89 and may be purchased at http://www.budweisereventscenter.com/events/details/?event_id=75 . For concert goers looking to stay the night in Loveland, Fairfield Inn & Suites by Marriott Loveland is offering special rates for events at the Budweiser Events Center. and to book a reservation, please visit http://www.marriott.com/meeting-event-hotels/group-corporate-travel/groupCorp.mi?resLinkData=Budweiser%20Event%20Center%5E7BU%60FTCLV%60&app=resvlink&stop_mobi=yes . TripAdvisor 2015 Certificate of Excellence Winner, Fairfield Inn & Suites Marriott Loveland, right across I-25 from Budweiser Events Center, makes it the ideal hotel for guests of the event to stay the night after the concert. Guests will enjoy great hotel amenities including: free hot breakfast buffet daily, complimentary high-speed Internet, indoor pool and spa, fitness center with weights and much more. Room types include king and queen rooms, suites and accessible rooms, available upon request. For reservations or more information about the Fairfield Inn & Suites Marriott Loveland, please visit http://www.fairfieldloveland.com or call (970) 461-1000. The Fairfield Inn & Suites Marriott Loveland hotel is proudly managed by Stonebridge Companies in Denver, Colorado.
Founded in 1991 by Navin C. Dimond, Stonebridge Companies is a privately owned, innovative hotel owner, operator and developer headquartered near Denver, Colorado. The diverse listing of properties includes select-service, extended-stay, mid-scale and full-service hotels in markets throughout the U.S. For detailed information, visit our website at http://www.sbcos.com .
